front.title: IPv4 Support for Proxy Mobile IPv6

abstract.t: This document specifies extensions to the Proxy Mobile IPv6 protocol [ID-PMIP6] for supporting IPv4. The scope of the IPv4 support in Proxy Mobile IPv6 includes the support for the mobile node's IPv4 home address mobility and for supporting the scenario where the local mobility anchor and the mobile access gateway are separated by an IPv4 transport network. The solution primarily leverages the extensions defined in Dual Stack Mobile IPv6 specification [ID- DSMIP6] for achieving this.
